    public class EatingAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action

    Tan Wei Li

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        If player eats the food, remove the food from the player inventory and add heal points to player. If Human eats the food, remove the food from the ground at location of the Human and add heal points to the Human. Return a description of the eating action to be displayed to user.
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action
        map - The map the actor is on
        Returns:
        a description of the action suitable for feedback in the UI
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor or map argument is null

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
                                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        A string describing the action suitable for displaying in the UI menu.
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:
        a String, e.g. "Player eat the food"
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if actor is null
